hidden_dimensions.name: Lasting Stain
hidden_dimensions.description: How well the lipstick stays on the lips for an extended period, resisting transfer and fading.

hidden_dimensions.name: Color Accuracy
hidden_dimensions.description: How closely the actual color of the lipstick matches the advertised or expected color.

hidden_dimensions.name: Glitter/Sparkle Intensity
hidden_dimensions.description: The degree of glitter or sparkle present in the lipstick, and how it corresponds to expectations.

hidden_dimensions.name: Texture and Moisture
hidden_dimensions.description: The feel of the lipstick on the lips, including its smoothness and moisturizing properties (or lack thereof).
